info.title: Interhome Group Distribution API
info.description:
The Webservices have been developed for Interhome Group using a REST-approach.

## Endpoint-URLs Format
[Base URL][REST route][Selectors][Query parameters]

## Service URLs
Test System: https://ws.interhome.com/test/ih/b2b/V0100/

Production system: https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/

Routes, selectors and query parameters are specified below with each individual service.
## Limitation of requests
Test Environment: 50 RQ /second

Productive Environment: 200 RQ/second

Please use "Accept-Encoding: gzip" to reduce traffic.

## Scheduled downtime
Every Tuesday morning around 4:00 to 6:00 (CET), our service might be unresponsive due to system updates.

get.description:
## Description
The method returns a list of all accommodations (code, name, date of modification) with an active contract.
## Use case
This method is typically called during a nightly or weekly automated update of property data. The returned static data for the accommodation codes is afterwards updated using the *Accommodation/Details* service and is cached locally.
            
Please be aware that you should use the query parameter *ModifiedSince* to receive just the accommodation which have been updated in the following fields since your last import: *Prices*, *Accommodation/Details*. Interhome does not support any info of inactivated properties; so you need to create your own delta.
## Caching
Yes
## Timing/Duration of call
Whole portfolio: 1 second
            
With *ModifiedSince*: 3 seconds
## Examples
[https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list)

parameters.name: ModifiedSince
parameters.description:
Filters results to accommodations modified after a given
date. ModifiedSince can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: Brand
parameters.description: One or many specific brands

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description: List of ModifyTypes to specifically search for. For example you want to check every 5 minutes for changes on availability then use 'VACANCY' (see LastModifiedTypeEnum)

get.description:
## Description
The method returns a list of all accommodations (code, name, date of modification) with an active contract for the selected country.
## Use case
This method is typically called during a nightly or weekly automated update of property data. The returned static data for the accommodation codes is afterwards updated using the *Accommodation/Details* service and is cached locally.
            
Please be aware that you should use the query parameter *ModifiedSince* to receive just the accommodation which have been updated in the following fields since your last import: *Prices*, *Accommodation/Details*. Interhome does not support any info of inactivated properties; so you need to create your own delta.
## Caching
Yes
## Timing/Duration of call
Whole portfolio: 1 second
            
With *ModifiedSince*: 3 seconds
## Examples
[https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list)

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: All accommodations in this country

parameters.name: ModifiedSince
parameters.description:
Filters results to accommodations modified after a given
dateModifiedSince can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: Brand
parameters.description: One or many specific brands

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description: List of ModifyTypes to specifically search for. For example you want to check every 5 minutes for changes on availability then use 'VACANCY' (see LastModifiedTypeEnum)

## Examples
[https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list)

get.description:
## Description
The method returns a list of all accommodations (code, name, date of modification) with an active contract for the selected house.
## Use case
This method is typically called during a nightly or weekly automated update of property data. The returned static data for the accommodation codes is afterwards updated using the *Accommodation/Details* service and is cached locally.
            
Please be aware that you should use the query parameter *ModifiedSince* to receive just the accommodation which have been updated in the following fields since your last import: *Prices*, *Accommodation/Details*. Interhome does not support any info of inactivated properties; so you need to create your own delta.
## Caching
Yes
## Timing/Duration of call
Whole portfolio: 1 second
            
With *ModifiedSince*: 3 seconds
## Examples
[https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list)

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: All accommodations in this country

parameters.name: placeCode
parameters.description: All accommodations in this country and place

parameters.name: houseCode
parameters.description: All accommodations in this house

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Specific accommodation in the given house

parameters.name: ModifiedSince
parameters.description:
Filters results to accommodations modified after a given
dateModifiedSince can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: Brand
parameters.description: One or many specific brands

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description: List of ModifyTypes to specifically search for. For example you want to check every 5 minutes for changes on availability then use 'VACANCY' (see LastModifiedTypeEnum)

get.description:
## Description
The Accommodation Detail method returns all static data (descriptions, attributes, media URLs) of an accommodation.
Multiple languages can be retrieved at once by adding "Language" parameters to the URL
## Use case
This method is typically used on the property details page.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.
